item.description:
Let's head down to Mohegan sun for a day of gambling entertainment.  There are lots of choice for various gaming or just do some people watching.  Many options for imbibing or eating not to mention a slew of stores if one wishes to shop as well.

We will travel in a dedicated "party bus" that has tables and seating to allow us to enjoy refreshments or hone our skills with some card games on the way down.

 

LEAVING HOME DEPOT AT 10:00 AM - PLEASE BE PROMPT PEOPLE!  EVENT FEE DUE IN CASH TO BOARD VEHICLE.

 

LEAVING MOHEGAN at 6:00 PM SO YOUR BOTTOM BETTER BE ON THE BUS - IT IS A VERY LONG WALK HOME!

 

As there are tables we can enjoy refreshments on the ride down and back.  There will be ice to keep items cold as needed.  I will also bring a couple of decks of cards and a compact letter tile game.

 

Remember to bring your license or picture ID to get a Player's Club card.  If you don't have one already I think they give you free $$ to gamble at will.  ATM fees are VERY high at the casino.
item.how_to_find_us: 1st pickup Home Depot parking lot off of 95 - exit 39 - 2nd pickup Oak Grove
item.name: DAY TRIP TO MOHEGAN SUN
